channel.title: American Express Realise the Potential: Tony Hawks Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Best-selling author and comedian Tony Hawks gives an overview of American Express’ ‘flashscribing’ session that saw crowds of people at Westfield, London co-create a new short book.
channel.itunes:author: Tony Hawks with American Express
channel.itunes:summary: Best-selling author and comedian Tony Hawks, hosted an improv-style ‘flashscribing’ event that saw crowds of people co-create a new short book – each person volunteering a word or sentence following on from the last in a ‘tag-writing’ format. The crowd decided the book’s heroes, plotline and overall story genre ending up with a classic girl meets boy story with a modern twist on the pitfalls of dating. An editor recorded the developing story, edited it in real-time and uploaded chapter summaries on to a giant screen to keep the crowd up to date and stimulated. The completed book will be available on the microsite mycreativepotential.co.uk with each contributor getting a credit.
